name: Generar datos senoidales
Chart Viewer
format:
<canvas id="myChart" width="800" height="400"></canvas>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
<script>
(function(scope) {
    let sampleIndex = 0;
    let maxPoints = 500;
    let selectedChannel = "all";

    const ctx = document.getElementById('myChart').getContext('2d');
    const chart = new Chart(ctx, {
        type: 'scatter',
        data: {
            datasets: [
                { label: 'ch0', data: [], backgroundColor: 'red', showLine: false, pointRadius: 2 },
                { label: 'ch1', data: [], backgroundColor: 'blue', showLine: false, pointRadius: 2 },
                { label: 'ch2', data: [], backgroundColor: 'green', showLine: false, pointRadius: 2 },
                { label: 'ch3', data: [], backgroundColor: 'orange', showLine: false, pointRadius: 2 }
            ]
        },
        options: {
            animation: false,
            scales: {
                x: {
                    type: 'linear',
                    title: {
                        display: true,
                        text: 'Muestras',
                        font: { size: 26 }   // tamaño del texto del título del eje X
                },
                    ticks: {
                        font: { size: 24 }   // tamaño de los números del eje X
                    }
                },
                y: {
                    title: {
                    display: true,
                    text: 'Valor',
                    font: { size: 26 }   // tamaño del texto del título del eje Y
                },
                    ticks: {
                        font: { size: 24 }   // tamaño de los números del eje Y
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    });

    scope.$watch('msg', function(msg) {
        if (!msg) return;

        if (msg.topic === "maxPoints") {
            maxPoints = msg.payload;
            return;
        }

        if (msg.topic === "channel") {
            selectedChannel = msg.payload;
            chart.data.datasets.forEach((ds, i) => {
                ds.hidden = selectedChannel !== "all" && ds.label !== selectedChannel;
            });
            chart.update();
            return;
        }

        if (msg.topic === "clear") {
            chart.data.datasets.forEach(ds => ds.data = []);
            sampleIndex = 0;
            chart.update();
            return;
        }

        if (!msg.payload || !msg.payload.channels) return;
        const ch = msg.payload.channels;
        const length = ch.ch0.length;

        for (let i = 0; i < length; i++) {
            if (selectedChannel === "all" || selectedChannel === "ch0")
                chart.data.datasets[0].data.push({x: sampleIndex, y: ch.ch0[i]});
            if (selectedChannel === "all" || selectedChannel === "ch1")
                chart.data.datasets[1].data.push({x: sampleIndex, y: ch.ch1[i]});
            if (selectedChannel === "all" || selectedChannel === "ch2")
                chart.data.datasets[2].data.push({x: sampleIndex, y: ch.ch2[i]});
            if (selectedChannel === "all" || selectedChannel === "ch3")
                chart.data.datasets[3].data.push({x: sampleIndex, y: ch.ch3[i]});

            sampleIndex++;
        }

        chart.data.datasets.forEach(ds => {
            if (ds.data.length > maxPoints) {
                ds.data.splice(0, ds.data.length - maxPoints);
            }
        });

        chart.update();
    });
})(scope);
</script>

name: Set Channel
func:
msg.topic = "channel";
return msg;

name: Set maxPoints
func:
msg.topic = "maxPoints";
return msg;

name: sample_rate

flow.set("sample_rate", msg.payload);
return null;

return null;
